1000101101000111 1000011100111011 0 -> sum: 0001001010000010, cout: 1
0011110011100101 0100011010010011 0 -> sum: 1000001101111000, cout: 0
1111000110010110 1101110010010100 1 -> sum: 1100111000101011, cout: 1
1011101110101101 0011110111010101 0 -> sum: 1111100110000010, cout: 0
0111101100101011 0001010011101000 1 -> sum: 1001000000010100, cout: 0
1010000111110000 1110101011111011 1 -> sum: 1000110011101100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
